decision_conditions: Roof not to be used as balcony
Noise from extrct and vent equip on devt
description: Variation of condition 1 (Approved Plans) and 8 (Noise Report) of planning permission reference 23/4939/HSE dated 07/02/24 for 'Conversion of garage into habitable space with increased height, crown roof and rooflight. Infill side extension with wrap around to rear garage extension. Fenestration changes to create/alter new windows in side/rear elevations, french doors to replace existing rear windows. New rooflight in existing rear extension. Roof extension including rear dormer window, 1no. rear and 1no. side rooflights. Installation of air conditioning unit with associated enclosure. Alterations and extension to rear patio.' Variation to include relocation of air conditioning unit, increased rear patio, reduced size of rooflight within garage conversion. Alterations to front and rear amenity space. New bin enclosure and relocation of side garden shed to replace existing rear shed (Amended Description and Plans)
